attributes.additional_details: YouTube memberships deprive viewers content that they previously had access to, this is UNACCEPTABLE youtube is a FREE service, if any channel wants to do memberships, they should do it on a different service.
attributes.background: Stop youtube channels charging viewers content that had previously been available to them.

rejection.details: Any decision to impose charges for posting and viewing content on YouTube is a matter for them as a private business, and for its users, not the UK Government or Parliament.
